Summary: SWE3 Ccplex Aurix Changes for NV Bootchain Configurator
Description:
When SetNextBootchain API provided by NVM is called, the execution of the task takes around 3 second.
 In case we issue any other command for Setting or Getting the bootchain, we get an error on the Aurix console and the NVM persistency blocks are corrupted.
 This leads to invalid response from getNext bootchain in the subsequent power cycles due to which ORIN does not boot up.
customfield_10010:
No NV block Corruption at NV API queries_x000D_
_x000D_

_x000D_

aurix_build fix MR: https://git-gddsdojlrmotorcom/ADAS/loki/sw-integration/loki-builds/aurix_build/-/merge_requests/543
